text: Ne omwandu kwa Nyasaye yahelesia Omurumwa wuwe okhurula khubandu betsingongo, nikwa Nyasaye nende Omurumwa, nende Abeekho, nende Abafwilwa, nende Abamanani nende bananjila, kho kukhaye okhubotokhana khubayinda mwinywe, ne shia Omurumwa abahelesia mubukule ne shiabakaya mushileshe, ne murie Nyasaye , toto Nyasaye niweshinyasio eshilulu
